Quick Facts

EXIT   X

INTRODUCTION TO MONEY LAUNDERING

Page

Table of Contents

 

Heavy civil and criminal penalties apply for breaches of the Act.

 

Failure to comply with the Act can attract the following heavy penalties:

For individuals:
 

•         civil penalties of up to $3.6 million

 

•         a criminal penalty of up to 4 years imprisonment as well as a fine

For companies:

 

•         civil penalties of up to $18 million

BE CAREFUL

 

As a professional within your organisation, you may also be subject to both prosecution and legal action by a third party if you fail to comply with your obligations under the Act and other

anti-money laundering legislation.

 

You should keep up-to-date with anti-money laundering legislation and ensure you read and understand your organisation's AML policy.
